Package SpaceVessel

Class Crew

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceVessel.Crew
  • public class Crew
extends java.lang.Object
    Crews are your friend, they carry out your order. Each Ship as a crew of 4.
    Version:
    0.30
    Author:
    Bach Vu, Linh Luu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int ID
      ID of Crew on ship (0-3) to support get Crew from ship's Crew list
      boolean Real
      Check if the crew was instantiated from MissionFrame.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Crew()
      Empty object to search for crew
      Crew​(java.lang.String name, CrewRank rank, int health, int hunger, int morale, javax.swing.ImageIcon img)
      Actual constructor, only called in MissionFrame when player choose crew type

      Get crew's morale

      Get crew's name

      Order crew to repair ship

      Set crew's name in crew penel txtbox

      Let Crew sleep to increase Health and Morale, but hungry when wake up
      java.lang.String toString()
      Quick output to check Crew status when testing
      void useSupply​(int amount, Stock stock)
      Order crew to use stock (food, medicine, potion) from Ship Inventory to increase HP, Hunger and morale

    • Field Detail

      • ID

        public int ID
        ID of Crew on ship (0-3) to support get Crew from ship's Crew list

      • Real

        public boolean Real
        Check if the crew was instantiated from MissionFrame. If false, cannot perform action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Crew

        public Crew()
        Empty object to search for crew

      • Crew

        public Crew​(java.lang.String name,
            CrewRank rank,
            int health,
            int hunger,
            int morale,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon img)
        Actual constructor, only called in MissionFrame when player choose crew type
        Parameters:
        name - Default by button, rename here
        rank - Selected by player via button on mission frame
        health - Depends on crew Rank, min 100
        hunger - Depends on crew Rank, min 100
        morale - Depends on crew Rank, min 100
        img - Avatar, depends on crew Rank

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Set crew's name in crew penel txtbox

        name - New name for crew

      • useSupply

        public void useSupply​(int amount,
                      Stock stock)
        Order crew to use stock (food, medicine, potion) from Ship Inventory to increase HP, Hunger and morale
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of stock to use
        stock - what stock to use

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Let Crew sleep to increase Health and Morale, but hungry when wake up

      • repair

        public void repair​(Spaceship Ship)
        Order crew to repair ship
        Parameters:
        Ship - Ship of the crew

      • pilotShip

        public void pilotShip()
        crew must have action to pilot ship at anytime, otherwise ship cannot move
